function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Outbreak of Covid-19 pandemic","Impact":"Loss in various domains, including healthcare facilities and global economy","Mitigation":"Implementation of necessary measures and treatments, real-time updates, and safety measures","Technologies":"Internet for real-time updates and mass media dataset analysis","People":"People around the world","Owner":"Healthcare industry and global authorities"},{"Description":"Adverse impact on healthcare industry","Impact":"Daily rise in Covid-19 positive cases and strain on healthcare resources","Mitigation":"Implementation of necessary measures, treatment protocols, and resource management","Technologies":"Healthcare technology and telemedicine","People":"Healthcare professionals and patients","Owner":"Healthcare industry and regulatory authorities"},{"Description":"Unstructured media dataset","Impact":"Difficulty in understanding the impact and affected areas of global economy","Mitigation":"Structuring the dataset into topics or categories using dictionaries, corpus, or supervised learning methods","Technologies":"Latent Dirichlet Allocation (LDA) and Non-negative Matrix Factorization (NMF)","People":"Researchers and data scientists","Owner":"Research organizations and technology companies"}]}
